What's funny is that when you think of it moe girls are just the natural progression of combining mascots for things with booth babes and such.  There are companies that have their mascot as moe girls and that cause if you have people dress up as your mascot it's way cheaper to have a moe girl than a actual mascot.

topics.body:
Say, do you guys miss the experience of playing a game, any game, that would leave you at the edge of your seat and all giddy, and when you're done with the game, you just want to play it again because the experience was so awesome and magical to you as if you learnt so much from it?

I had that feeling when I played my first Final Fantasy game and also my first Kingdom Hearts game.
